newsitem.title: DENMARK: Danish bond prices dampened by fresh EMU fears.
newsitem.headline: Danish bond prices dampened by fresh EMU fears.

text.p: Danish bond prices fell back after early gains on Monday, with a French call for time to think over the EU stability pact overshadowing initial joy at Friday's low U.S. jobless numbers.
"Since the morning the focus has shifted to the ECOFIN (European Union economy and finance ministers) meeting in Luxembourg," a dealer said

"Until we know more about the French government's position on the stability pact the (Danish) market will probably stay quiet, although it could also depend on developments on the U.S. market later in the day," he added.
